title: Quick MBTI Test
description: Discover your MBTI personality type with 12 quick questions!

questions.question: At a party or gathering, you...

choices.text: Talk to many people and feel energized
Have deep conversations with a few close friends

questions.question: When starting a new project, you...

choices.text: Create detailed plans and steps first
See the big picture and stay flexible

questions.question: When making decisions, you rely on...
When a friend suddenly asks to hang out on the weekend...

choices.text: I wish they told me earlier... Let me think about it

questions.question: When solving problems, you prefer to...

choices.text: Take the lead and set direction
Maintain harmony and support team members
Hang out with people to feel better
Set a rough direction and go with the flow

questions.question: In conversations, you prefer to talk about...

choices.text: Best work comes near the deadline
Initiate conversation and lead the interaction

results.title: The Enthusiastic Campaigner (ENFP)
results.description: You are an ENFP, full of passion and creativity! You love exploring new possibilities and creating deep connections with people. A free spirit who doesn't conform to rules, you inspire those around you with your energy and ideas.

results.title: The Idealistic Mediator (INFP)
results.description: You are an INFP with a rich inner world! You value ideals and principles, quietly wanting to make the world a better place. Highly empathetic with a talent for creative expression.

results.title: The Strategic Mastermind (INTJ)
results.description: You are an INTJ with vision and strategy! Excellent at analyzing complex problems and making long-term plans. Independent with high standards, you steadily work toward your goals.

results.title: The Bold Commander (ENTJ)
results.description: You are an ENTJ, a natural-born leader! Excellent at presenting vision and leading teams, you value efficiency and achievement. You enjoy challenges and make decisions with confidence.

results.title: The Logical Thinker (INTP)
results.description: You are an INTP overflowing with intellectual curiosity! You enjoy exploring logic and theory, solving complex problems. Original ideas and deep thinking are your strengths.

results.title: The Witty Debater (ENTP)
results.description: You are an ENTP, witty and challenging! You enjoy exploring new ideas and debating, questioning conventional approaches. Your quick thinking and eloquence captivate others.

results.title: The Reliable Realist (ISTJ)
results.description: You are an ISTJ, responsible and reliable! Systematic and meticulous, you always keep your promises. You value tradition and order, completing tasks to perfection.

results.title: The Dedicated Defender (ISFJ)
results.description: You are an ISFJ, warm and devoted! You love caring for and supporting those around you, quietly considerate. Detail-oriented with a strong sense of responsibility.

results.title: The Strict Executive (ESTJ)
results.description: You are an ESTJ who values order and efficiency! Excellent at leading organizations and creating systems, you uphold clear standards and rules. Practical and decisive.

results.title: The Social Diplomat (ESFJ)
results.description: You are an ESFJ, warm and social! You enjoy harmonizing with people and helping others, quick to notice needs around you. Responsible with deep consideration.

results.title: The Insightful Counselor (INFJ)
results.description: You are an INFJ with deep insight! You find great meaning in understanding and helping people, with an idealistic vision. Quiet but with strong convictions.

results.title: The Charismatic Advocate (ENFJ)
results.description: You are an ENFJ, charismatic and inspiring! You love leading people and helping them grow, wanting to contribute to community development. A warm leader.

results.title: The Curious Artist (ISFP)
results.description: You are an ISFP with excellent artistic sense! You enjoy the present moment and explore the world in your own way. Gentle and warm, quietly considerate.

results.title: The Free Entertainer (ESFP)
results.description: You are an ESFP, spontaneous and vibrant! You enjoy the moment and bring energy to those around you. Social and fun-loving, you make the most of life.

results.title: The Versatile Craftsman (ISTP)
results.description: You are an ISTP, calm and analytical! Skilled at hands-on work and problem-solving, you assess situations logically. Independent and prefer efficient approaches.

results.title: The Adventurous Entrepreneur (ESTP)
results.description: You are an ESTP, action-oriented! With quick judgment and execution, you seize opportunities and enjoy thrills and adventure. Realistic and highly adaptable.
